title: SEAFORT ORB / walk into water
description: (walk into water dialogue, foreshadowing for dream)

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "A strange feeling... looking at the..."
dialogueTree.text: A strange feeling... looking at the water. Maybe you should just wander off into the sea? Leave it all and walk in...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "With a bottle in your hand."
links.text: With a bottle in your hand.

links.title: You: "A bottle in my hand?"
links.text: A bottle in my hand?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Always."
links.text: Always.

links.title: You: "Why?"
links.text: Why?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Perhaps there's someone there? Unde..."
links.text: Perhaps there's someone there? Under the water. Waiting for you.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Where it has always been."
links.text: Where it has always been.

links.title: Shivers: "In front of the video rental on the..."
links.text: In front of the video rental on the corner. At the crossing...

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Smelling of Tutti Frutti and betray..."
links.text: Smelling of Tutti Frutti and betrayal.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Baby, you know it's going to hurt."
links.text: Baby, you know it's going to hurt.

links.title: You: "But it's cold..."
links.text: But it's cold...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes -- cold and still. But love is..."
links.text: Yes -- cold and still. But love is warm, like the inside of her mouth.

links.title: You: "Yes, please..."
links.text: Yes, please...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Oh *fuck* yes. Go there in your hea..."
links.text: Oh *fuck* yes. Go there in your head. It's been days since you've thought about her. A week...

links.title: Volition: "No-no, we're not starting with that..."
links.text: No-no, we're not starting with that. Not now. Not this time. This thought is over.

links.title: You: "No-no-no-no..."
links.text: No-no-no-no...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes, yes, yes, yes."
links.text: Yes, yes, yes, yes.

links.title: You: "Raise your sight."
links.text: Raise your sight.

links.title: Inland Empire: "In the still mirror of the bay you..."
links.text: In the still mirror of the bay you see Martinaise, reflected. Tall edifices of ruins reach into the water, like shimmering towers. And the shacks too. Pine trees and motor lorries, upside down...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Islets and posts like stepping ston..."
links.text: Islets and posts like stepping stones lead into the water in front of you. Go. Step in... it's been too long.

links.title: You: "[Shake your head.]"
links.text: [Shake your head.]
